references.reason: This is a foundational textbook in image processing, providing essential background for understanding the techniques used in digital watermarking.

references.paper_title: An overview of digital video watermarking
references.reason: This review paper provides a comprehensive overview of digital video watermarking, which is a closely related field to image watermarking and relevant to the paper's discussion of watermarking techniques.
This seminal work is a foundational reference in the field of digital watermarking, establishing many fundamental concepts and techniques used in the paper's discussion of watermarking algorithms.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are crucial for many of the modern watermarking algorithms mentioned and evaluated in the paper.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the score-based generative models used in the modern watermarking methods that are analyzed and discussed in this work.
